scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains orders for goods and money from John Wesley Hunt and his son Thomas Hunt, both of Lexington, Kentucky; bills on John W. Hunt for goods and services; receipts; checks drawn on the Bank of Louisville to David A. Sayre from John W. Hunt; and a note to John W. Hunt from T.K. Layten asking to let Jim Tydringa, an enslaved Black man, have $20 worth of goods (September 1, 1834).
